hero.title: By Sectors
hero.description: We provide comprehensive protection with Anti-Drone and C-UAS solutions tailored to the unique security needs of each sector.

askeriTesisler.title: Military Facilities
askeriTesisler.description: Military bases, operation centers, radar stations and airports form the backbone of a country's national security structure.

detail.title: Anti-Drone Security Doctrine
detail.paragraph1: These critical facilities are now exposed not only to conventional threats but also to modern and asymmetric threats such as small-sized drones, swarm drone attacks and unauthorized aircraft flights.
detail.paragraph2: BISAVUNMA offers a multi-layered and integrated security doctrine centered on Anti-Drone technologies to protect these critical areas.

systems.title: Radar-Based Early Warning
systems.description: Detects even the smallest targets at low altitude and with low radar cross-section

systems.title: RF Detection and Signal Intelligence
systems.description: Determines the communication link between drone and control, reveals the operator's location with frequency analysis

systems.title: Electro-Optical and Thermal Systems
systems.description: Provides visual identification and verification in day/night conditions

systems.title: Soft-Kill Anti-Drone Solutions
systems.description: Only activated when needed, causes target drones to lose direction or makes them fall safely

systems.title: Hard-Kill Anti-Drone Systems
systems.description: Directly neutralizes threat elements with automatic weapon integrations

askeriTesisler.integration: All these elements work integrated with C2 command control infrastructure. The target determined by the radar is verified with RF detection, identified with electro-optical systems, then neutralized with soft-kill and hard-kill systems. Thus, military facilities are protected with a 24/7 end-to-end Anti-Drone and air security system.

enerjiAltyapi.title: Energy & Critical Infrastructure
enerjiAltyapi.description: Power plants, dams, oil and natural gas infrastructure, nuclear facilities and telecommunication centers are vital for a country's economic and strategic security.

detail.title: Anti-Drone and C-UAS Solutions
detail.paragraph1: An attack or sabotage on these areas can lead to crises not only at the national level but also globally.
detail.paragraph2: BISAVUNMA maximizes facility security with Anti-Drone and C-UAS (Counter-Unmanned Aerial Systems) solutions developed for these infrastructures.

systems.title: Multi-Band RF Detection
systems.description: Detection of drones operating at different frequencies is made

systems.title: Spectrum Analysis
systems.description: Wrapped spectrum and waterfall analyses present electromagnetic density to the operator with instant and historical data

systems.title: Electro-Optical & Thermal Verification
systems.description: Provides visual confirmation

systems.title: Soft-Kill Jammer Solutions
systems.description: Instantly disables drones

systems.title: Hard-Kill Integration
systems.description: Drones approaching critical infrastructure are directly neutralized

enerjiAltyapi.integration: This entire process operates as an integrated system fully compatible with existing security infrastructure. Thus, energy and critical infrastructures have uninterrupted security armor reinforced with Anti-Drone solutions.

limanTersaneler.title: Ports & Shipyards
limanTersaneler.description: Ports and shipyards are of strategic importance both for the security of international trade and for the protection of naval military power.

detail.title: Anti-Drone Focused Integrated Defense
detail.paragraph1: These facilities are exposed to hybrid threats from sea, land and air sources; in recent years, particularly drone-based intelligence, sabotage and attack attempts have increased.
detail.paragraph2: BISAVUNMA develops Anti-Drone focused integrated defense systems for ports and shipyards.

systems.title: Radar Surveillance Systems
systems.description: Simultaneously tracks air and maritime traffic

systems.title: RF Intelligence Solutions
systems.description: Determines threat sources by analyzing control signals

systems.title: Electro-Optical and Thermal Sensors
systems.description: Visually identifies drones

systems.title: Soft-Kill Jammer Solutions
systems.description: Safely disables unauthorized drones

systems.title: Hard-Kill Anti-Drone Systems
systems.description: Directly neutralizes threats with high-precision automatic weapons

limanTersaneler.integration: In this way, the port area is secured with multi-layered protection not only against classical threats but also against drone and unmanned aerial vehicle attacks.

sinirGuvenligi.title: Border Security
sinirGuvenligi.description: Border security now requires not only the protection of the land line but also the control of airspace.

detail.title: Anti-Drone and C-UAS Solutions
detail.paragraph1: Especially small drones, unauthorized light aircraft flights and hybrid threats have made border security complex.
detail.paragraph2: BISAVUNMA provides the most advanced level of security with Anti-Drone and C-UAS solutions developed for border security.

systems.title: Radar and RF Detection Systems
systems.description: Provides uninterrupted surveillance along the border line

systems.title: Electro-Optical & Thermal Systems
systems.description: Provides the highest accuracy in threat identification in the border area

systems.title: Soft-Kill Jammer Solutions
systems.description: Instantly disables drones and aircraft

systems.title: Hard-Kill Anti-Drone Weapon Systems
systems.description: Guarantees border security by neutralizing critical threats

systems.title: C2 Integration
systems.description: Real-time data sharing is made between radar, RF, jammer, electro-optical and hard-kill systems

sinirGuvenligi.integration: In this way, the border line becomes not just a surveillance line; but a fully integrated, Anti-Drone focused, dynamic defense ecosystem.

cta.title: Sector-Specific Solutions
cta.description: From military facilities to border security, from energy infrastructure to port facilities, we offer customized solutions for every sector.
